request.body: <request> <lang language_id="100" langName="New Esperanto"/> <lang language_id="101" langName="New Greek"/> </request>

response.body: <readResponse> <lang language_id="100" langName="New Esperanto"> </lang> <lang language_id="101" langName="New Greek"> </lang> </readResponse>

teardown.sql: DELETE FROM language WHERE language_id between 100 and 150
